name: The Water Bottle
description:
This is... The Water Bottle. I made this game to re-learn Ren'py after a while (What's with the new GUI) anyway, I made it on the bus so expect it to be bad...

Also forgot to change the main screen background

Water Bottle: Found it on Google.
